times round 24-26 i finished my cap with a single_crochet in every chain stitch up the length you want or maybe with a double_crochet round 24 was crocheted with a main color and round 25-26-27 i finished with the second color round 27 finish your cap with reverse single_crochet after the cap is finished cut the thread and weave the ends wash it and give it the desired shape using a dummy or straighten it gently and dry flat crocheted skull cap kufi darling daddy hat page 5 of 6 graphic pattern crocheted skull cap kufi darling daddy hat page 6 of 6 follow me clickable
